0.title: Basic Syntax: Direct Pattern
0.body: Just putting the word you need to match in the pattern will get the word you are looking for

challenges.problem: Who let the dogs out ? who ? who ?

1.title: Basic Syntax: Start Of A Pattern
1.body: ^ symbol marks the start of a pattern.Only Match String starting with "Who"

2.title: Basic Syntax: End Of A Pattern
2.body: $ symbol marks the end of a pattern.Match Below patterns ðŸ˜ˆðŸ˜‰

challenges.problem: Who let the dogs out ? who ? who ?
Who is batman ? who ? she asked.

3.title: Basic Syntax: Escape Is Eminent
3.body: You need to use the escape symbol (\) when running into any of the special characters.

4.title: Basic Syntax: This Or That
4.body: | symbol allows you to match multiple items

challenges.problem: Who let the dogs out ? who ? who ?
Who is batman ? who ? she asked.
